description: Normal: Multi-topic day with 7 commits mixing bug fixes and feature work from a single author (Bob Schmidt). Covers REST API error handling, a new health-check endpoint, and test fixes.

commits.message: Fix NPE in REST API client when server returns empty body
Add retry logic with exponential backoff for transient HTTP errors
Implement /health endpoint for Ollama backend connectivity check
Add integration test for health endpoint with WireMock
Fix flaky timeout test by increasing WireMock stub delay
Refactor HTTP client configuration into dedicated OllamaClientConfig class
Bump ktor-client version to 2.3.9 to resolve connection leak

summary.notes: Model should identify bug fix cluster (NPE, retry, flaky test), new feature (health endpoint), and refactoring/dependency update.

json.notes: Health endpoint is a feature. Retry logic and NPE fix are bug fixes. WireMock commits are testing. Config extraction is refactoring.
